document_data.name: Garden
document_data.mainbody: '''Garden''' was the seventh planet orbiting [[the sun]] of [[Realmspace]]. Rarely seen from [[Toril]], it appeared like a tiny green sparkle. It was one of the [[Five Wanderers]], the five [[wikipedia:Superior Planet|superior]]  planets of the Torilian solar system. According to the planetary scholars of [[Shou Lung]], Garden was an example of a rare [[live world]].

Moons.[[Grandchild]]: A perfectly spherical white moon with a high albedo.
Moons.[[Yerthad]]: A highly dangerous spherical moon with an [[acid]]ic atmosphere and covered with an ocean of acid.
Moons.[[Peaceon]]: A flat-shaped moon, once used by [[elf|elves]] as a stopping point, but later abandoned.
Moons.[[Retinae]]: An eye-shaped moon with a large crater that resembled a pupil. Fungus that grew within this crater could be used as a material component or ingredient in [[spell]]s and [[potion]]s that improved vision.
Moons.[[Glorianus]]: A crescent-shaped moon entirely covered in soft green [[grass]] and inhabited by a single [[druid]] called [[Griffon Broadleaf]].
Moons.[[Fjord]]: An airless, spherical mass of rock that had once been a mining colony.
Moons.[[Locci]]: An airless rectangular moon, somewhat damaged by [[meteor]] impacts.
Moons.[[Dragon Rock (moon)|Dragon Rock]]: A [[white dragon]]-shaped moon made of white [[jade]] with an atmosphere that smelled like pipe smoke. It had been created by an [[evil]] [[wizard]] in an attempt to learn Garden's secrets.
Moons.[[Knurl]]: A spherical moon made of [[marble]]. Rivers of somewhat liquid marble oozed on its surface. The fluid could be molded into sculptures and hardened within a few days of being removed from the moon.
Moons.[[Sunson]]: A spherical blue [[fire]] body, twice as hot as [[the sun]], which irradiated enough heat to warm up objects within a fair distance. Its light illuminated Garden during the night.
Moons.[[Templar]]: A circular moon inhabited by 100 [[mage]]s who studied Garden and sold [[magic item]]s to finance their research.
Moons.[[Farworld]]: A bustling trading post, despite its great distance from most inhabited planets.

document_data.Inhabitants:
Garden was inhabited by a pirate cove led by [[Orion]] of [[Calimshan]], who took the pseudonym [[Clive the Fearsome]] after his predecessor retired. The group consisted of 100 pirates commanding 12 small spelljamming ships.

The [[Chainmen]], a [[human]] group of slavers, supposedly had a base somewhere in Garden.
